channel.title: gsoc on Rizin
channel.description: Recent content in gsoc on Rizin

item.title: Google Summer of Code 2025 Summary - Part 1
item.description: Google Summer of Code 2025 Summary Two-thirds of GSoC 2025 have officially concluded, and we are pleased to congratulate two participants who successfully passed the program and completed the most important parts of their projects. One participant is continuing work on object-oriented (C++, Objective-C, Swift, etc.) analysis due to the extended timeline of the task. Taksh: Refactoring Rizin’s Native Debug Plugin â€“ My GSoC 2025 Journey Hello, I’m Taksh (aka well-mannered-goat), a junior student at IIIT Gwalior.

item.title: Google Summer of Code 2025 Announcement
item.description: An announcement of the Google Summer of Code 2025. Three accepted candidates.

item.title: GSoC 2024 - RISC-V Capstone auto-sync and RzIL uplifting
item.description: A description of the original GSoC 2024 task plans of updating RISC-V disassembler in Capstone, updating it in Rizin, and implementing RzIL uplifting and the actual progress

item.description: An announcement of the Google Summer of Code 2024. Two accepted candidates.

item.title: GSoC 2023 - Enhancing DWARF Support
item.description: In this article, I discuss my experience enhancing DWARF support in Rizin for Google Summer of Code 2023.

item.title: GSoC 2022 - x86 ISA lifting for RzIL
item.description: A summary of all the work done on RzIL lifting for x86 ISA, and how you can use it.

item.title: GSoC 2022 - rz-bindgen
item.description: An overview of rz-bindgen’s design, implementation, features, and future.

item.title: Google Summer of Code 2021 Summary
item.description: Google Summer of Code 2021 Summary GSoC 2021 is officially finished and we are happy to congratulate all 3 participants for passing the program and completing the most important parts of their tasks. It brought us some long-needed code cleanup and user-visible changes in the analysis and binary/heap parsing. See what students wrote themselves: 08A: Refactoring ELF binaries loading This summer I have been doing the GSoC for Rizin. The subject of the GSoC was to refactor and improve how elf binaries are loaded by Rizin.
